quotes.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
Nothing is impossible. Some things are just less likely than others.
The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
They did not know it was impossible so they did it.
The most rewarding things you do in life are often the ones that look like they cannot be done.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
Every noble work is at first impossible.
Man is the only creature that strives to surpass himself, and yearns for the impossible.
Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible for anyone to accomplish.
Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done.
The impossible often has a kind of integrity which the merely improbable lacks.
We are an impossibility in an impossible universe.
There is no point in using the word impossible to describe something that has clearly happened.
Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
No one gets very far unless he accomplishes the impossible at least once a day.
The impossible could not have happened, therefore the impossible must be possible in spite of appearances.
So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems so.
The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a man's determination.
If nature has taught us anything it is that the impossible is probable.
Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude.
Only if you are possible, everything will be possible.
I work on the motto that if something's not impossible, there must be a way to do it.
We have more power than will; and it is often by way of excuse to ourselves that we fancy things are impossible.
Nothing is impossible, the word itself says I'm possible!
There are many things that seem impossible only so long as one does not attempt them.
Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.
I wouldn't say anything is impossible. I think that everything is possible as long as you put your mind to it and put the work and time into it.
Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible.
We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
Some of the world's greatest feats were accomplished by people not smart enough to know they were impossible.
All things are possible until they are proved impossible and even the impossible may only be so, as of now.
It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
Nothing is more imminent than the impossible. What we must always foresee is the unforeseen.
The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
I won't predict anything historic. But nothing is impossible.
Whoever said nothing is impossible obviously hasn't tried nailing Jell-O to a tree.
To achieve the impossible; it is precisely the unthinkable that must be thought.
Never tell a young person that anything cannot be done. God may have been waiting centuries for someone ignorant enough of the impossible to do that very thing.

Ordinary people believe only in the possible. Extraordinary people visualize not what is possible or probable, but rather what is impossible. And by visualizing the impossible, they begin to see it as possible.
I know the power obedience has of making things easy which seem impossible.
Most of the things worth doing in the world had been declared impossible before they were done.
Man is so made that when anything fires his soul, impossibilities vanish.
There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
We all want to believe in impossible things, I suppose, to persuade ourselves that miracles can happen.
Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
